Room.Name: The Chug-A-Lug Pub
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a pretty rowdy bar in the southeastern side of town.
Room.LongDescription: The Chug-A-Lug is a down right rowdy tavern where just about anything can happen. Anyone can come in for a drink and to talk about the local news such as who is going to be fighting in the Melbourne Entertainment Arena in the evening. Gamblers and hookers abound in this sleezy bar, not to mention drunks, vagrants and even a few sailors.
